title: Catching Birds at Night Roosts
brief: Capture roosting birds by hand during nighttime when they are most vulnerable.
steps: Step 1: Locate bird roosting sites during daylight hours by observing their flight patterns.
Step 2: Wait until full darkness when birds are settled and less alert.
Step 3: Approach roosting sites quietly and slowly to avoid startling the birds.
Step 4: Grab birds directly by hand - pigeons and some other species can be taken this way.
Step 5: During nesting season, approach nests directly as some species won't leave even when approached.
warnings: Move slowly and quietly to avoid spooking entire roost.
Some birds may bite or scratch in defense.
Ensure you can safely reach roosting areas without falling.
